strapiPost.title: Find Locally Crafted Goods At The NWA Makers Market
strapiPost.content:
Hundreds of local craftsmen will set up shop with their goods during the NWA Makers Market this Sunday, Nov 6 at Washington County Fairgrounds. 

  • Ultimately local: From unique art to handmade furniture, everything at the Makers Market is made in NWA by people from NWA. 
  • So you know: There will be local coffee and food trucks at the event from 10a-5p. Parking on-site will cost $5. 

Invite your friends to the event HERE.
